R project settings

create_r_proj.Rd

create_r_proj is a helper function for new_cabinet_proj. Calling it outside the scope of new_cabinet_proj will only print the specified settings the console.

create_r_proj(
  version = "1.0",
  restore_workspace = c("No", "Yes", "Default"),
  save_workspace = c("No", "Yes", "Default"),
  save_history = c("Default", "No", "Yes"),
  enable_code_indexing = c("Yes", "No", "Default"),
  spaces_for_tab = c("Yes", "No", "Default"),
  num_spaces_for_tab = 2,
  encoding = "UTF-8",
  rnw_weave = "Sweave",
  latex = "pdfLaTeX",
  auto_append_new_line = "Yes",
  strip_trailing_white_space = "Yes"
)

Arguments

version

R project version number, to be passed as character string.
restore_workspace

Load the .Rdata file (if any) found in the initial working directory into the R workspace. Options are "No" (default), "Yes", and "Default". If "Default", global behaviour settings are inherited.
save_workspace

Save .RData on exit. Options are "No" (default), "Yes", and "Default". If "Default", global behaviour settings are inherited.
save_history

Always save history (even when not saving .RData). Options are "Default" (default), "Yes", and "No". If "Default", global behaviour settings are inherited.
enable_code_indexing

Determines whether R source files within the project directory are indexed for code navigation. Options are "Yes" (default), "No", and "Default". If "Default", global behaviour settings are inherited.
spaces_for_tab

Determine whether the tab key inserts multiple spaces rather than a tab character (soft tabs). Options are "Yes" (default), "No", and "Default". If "Default", global behaviour settings are inherited.
num_spaces_for_tab

Specify the number of spaces per soft-tab, integer.
encoding

Specify the default text encoding for source files. Default is "UTF-8".
rnw_weave

Specify how to weave Rnw files. Default is "Sweave".
latex

Specify LaTeX processing. Default is "pdfLaTeX".
auto_append_new_line

Ensure that source files end with a new line. Default is "Yes".
strip_trailing_white_space

Strip trailing horizontal white space when saving. Default is "Yes".

Value

The settings used to write a .Rproj file.

See also

https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200526207-Using-Projects for more information on these settings.

Examples

create_r_proj()
#> Version: 1.0
#> RestoreWorkspace: No
#> SaveWorkspace: No
#> AlwaysSaveHistory: Default
#> EnableCodeIndexing: Yes
#> UseSpacesForTab: Yes
#> NumSpacesForTab: 2
#> Encoding: UTF-8
#> RnwWeave: Sweave
#> LaTeX: pdfLaTeX
#> AutoAppendNewline: Yes
#> StripTrailingWhitespace: Yes
